name: The Apprentice - Summoning Belzebeef
description:
Live a wizard's ordinary day in this short adventure game!

Controls : Mouse only
Languages : French and English

This game was made in three chilly Friday afternoons by Julien Noël, who is a Belgian gamebook author, and myself. This is our first Fungus project, and hopefully not the last!

If you're interested by gamebooks, check out Julien's most recent work (in french) : https://www.7switch.com/fr/ebook/9782960226805/from/juliennoel
